title: Ending Radical and Wasteful Government DEI Programs and Preferencing
summary:
The document outlines Executive Order 14151, issued by the President on January 20, 2025, which aims to end government programs related to diversity, equity, and inclusion (DEI). It criticizes the Biden Administration's implementation of DEI initiatives, describing them as illegal and wasteful. The order mandates the termination of all DEI-related programs, positions, and performance requirements across federal agencies, ensuring that federal employment practices focus solely on individual merit and performance without DEI considerations.

Key actions include the coordination of program terminations by the Office of Management and Budget (OMB), reviews of federal employment practices, and assessments of the costs associated with previous DEI initiatives. The order emphasizes a commitment to serving all citizens with equal dignity and respect and aims to redirect government resources towards enhancing national greatness.

Additionally, it establishes a framework for the monthly monitoring of progress and challenges in implementing the order, while ensuring that any invalid provisions do not affect the overall directive. The document underscores a significant policy shift in federal employment and program management, signaling a departure from previous administrations' approaches to equity and inclusion.
